payload: Create a detailed architectural plan about how this repository is working. It has two main parts, one is procesing large amount of pdf files, chunk them up by questions, find similarity groups in order to do question deduplication, and it also has categorization feature to group questions into question categories. Other part is a vite application that's responsibility is to give visual representation of the questions. Go through all the existing codebase, keep in mind pdf and png files are dynam...
